Other: Bromochloroacetic acid;Bromoform;Chlorate;Chromium (hexavalent);Dibromoacetic acid;Dichloroacetic acid;Fluoride;Haloacetic acids (HAA5);Molybdenum;Monochloroacetic acid;Nitrate and nitrite;Strontium;Vanadium
